en_text: How is that the song of destruction?
jp_text: どこが終滅の歌だよ
google_translated: Where is the song of endlessness

en_text: Who just called me "useless four-eyes"?
jp_text: 誰ですか “雑魚メガネ”言ったの

en_text: So honest!
jp_text: 正直！

en_text: Hey, how are you supposed to read this?
jp_text:
（リン）
ねえ これってさ
どうやって見るの？
google_translated:
Hey this
How do you see?

en_text: These white things?
jp_text: この白いやつ？

en_text: White?\N Where do you see those?
jp_text: 白？　どこ見てんの？

en_text: Aren't they drawn with black ink?
jp_text: 黒のインクで描かれてるじゃん
google_translated: It is drawn with black ink

en_text: Although you tried to sing the song of destruction,\Nit turned into the song of healing...
jp_text:
終滅の歌を歌おうとしたのに
癒やしの歌になった
google_translated:
I tried to sing a song of endlessness
It became a healing song

en_text: He's thinking of excuses.
jp_text: 何 ブツブツ言ってんの？

en_text: I'm not!
jp_text: （アル）そうじゃなくて！

en_text: I don't know if you read it the wrong way, but
jp_text:
読み方を
どう間違えたのかは分かりませんが
google_translated:
How to read
I do not know how I made a mistake

en_text: when you sang the song of destruction, \Nit turned into the song of healing.
jp_text:
終滅の歌を歌おうとしたら
癒やしの歌になった
google_translated:
If you try to sing a song of endlessness
It became a healing song

en_text: There has to be more to this!
jp_text: これは絶対 何かあるはずですよ

en_text: Al...
jp_text: アル…

en_text: However, if we are defeated \Nthere will never be another dawn
jp_text:
だが 我々が敗北してしまえば
二度と明日は来ない
google_translated:
But if we defeat
I will never come again tomorrow

en_text: and today will surely be our last day!
jp_text:
今日が
最後の日になってしまうだろう
google_translated:
Today
It will be the last day

en_text: Do you want to see the morning sun!?
jp_text: 朝日が見たいか？
google_translated: Do you want to see the morning sun?

en_text: Comrades!
jp_text: （傭兵たち）おお！

en_text: Let's meet again tomorrow!
jp_text: 明日 また会おう！

en_text: Captain! \NThis battle will go down in history, right?
jp_text:
（ベロウ）
頭！
この戦いは歴史に刻まれるよな
google_translated:
Head!
This battle is not engraved in history

en_text: Of course!\NYou are all heroes!
jp_text:
（ヘンリー）
当然だ　君たち全員が英雄だ
google_translated: Naturally all you are the hero

en_text: A group of heroes needs a fitting name, right?
jp_text:
（スノア）
じゃあ
英雄にふさわしい名が必要だろ？
google_translated:
Surely
You need a name suitable for heroes?

en_text: What is our name!?
jp_text: 俺たちの名前は何だ？

en_text: Captain!
jp_text: （傭兵）頭！

en_text: Dash through the skies and reclaim the capital!
jp_text: 大空を駆け 王都を奪還するぞ！
google_translated: I will recapture the capital city!

en_text: The Sky Lion Brigade!
jp_text: 天空の獅子団！

en_text: Well then, let's get going too.
jp_text:
（アリュー）
じゃ あたしらも行こうか

en_text: Yes.
jp_text: うん

en_text: Make sure you come back.
jp_text: （ヴァイゼン）必ず帰ってこい

en_text: I promise.
jp_text: 約束します

en_text: Every song will eventually end.
jp_text:
（リン）
歌は いつか歌い終わるの

en_text: When it reaches the person \Nit was meant for,
jp_text: その人の心に届いたときが
google_translated: When it arrives in the person's heart

en_text: I'm a song that was sung for Finis' sake.
jp_text:
私は
フィーニスのために歌われた歌
google_translated:
I am
Songs sung for Finishis

en_text: So...  \NI'm sure...
jp_text: だから きっと…

en_text: At that time... I'll...
jp_text: （リン）そのとき 私は…

en_text: After all...
jp_text: だってさ…

en_text: Are you ready?
jp_text: 準備はいいか？

en_text: Takeoff!
jp_text: 発進 用意！

en_text: Let's go! \NTo the capital!
jp_text: 行くぞ！　目指すは王都だ！
google_translated: let's go!Aim for the royal capital!
